nodes.text: Armored Clothing was a category of armor covering vests, jackets, and pants that were plated with plastoid or ceramic pads, sometimes with mesh energy-dispersion layers. Very light in nature, the armor covered vital organs; with the plates woven into the fabric being very difficult to spot.
An example of this armor was the "ShadowStalker" assassin gear produced by Tenloss Syndicate.
